page.title: 05Inverarity Worker's Year 1
page.content: A half year in the life of Mr Ike Harrison,stockman. JANUARY-Feeding cattle inside / out - silage. FEBRUARY-As January,calving starts end of month. MARCH-As January and February calving season. APRIL-Calving/Feeding.Prepare young stock for sale.De-horn spring calves /Put bulls in beside cows to serve for the next spring. MAY-Sales of stock/Cattle out to grass /wean last summer's cows and calves /worm cattle and sort into lots for different fields. JUNE-Blood test all breeding stock for brucellosis.Summer calving starts,out working irregular hours.Check all stock outside.
